title: Be my Baby
lyrics:
Oh (uh oh uh oh)
You wanna be my Baby
Oh (uh oh uh oh)
Do you hear me?
Come on now (Huh)

Ppajyeodeul-eossji neogs-i naga neoleul chyeodabwa

Gyesog ppanhi gadhyeobeolyeoss-eo han sungan

So come on come on come on



Nege daga galsulog jit-eojineun neolan Color

Joyong hal li eobsji nae meolis-sog-eun ontong neolo

I can not beomjeob, na jungdog doen deus

Ne hyang-gi miso-e Two thumbs up



Machi neon nae mamsog maeil chajgo iss-eossdeon han jogag

Ttag majchwojin peojeul gatji

Michil deus wanbyeoghan neukkim-e hollyeo nan

Nal gamssaneun saeloun seollem

Come on come on come on

Here we go now, hey



Neoleul gajgo sip-eo Baby (yeah)

Ne tumyeonghan nunbich-eul ttala

Nae soljighan mam-eul jeonhalge

Neon nollajima



Geobuhal su eobs-eo Lady (oh)

Deo gakkawojin dul-ui geoli

Jag-eun solimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo



Yaiyaiya (yeah) yaiyaiya (oh)

(Come on come on come on)

Yaiyaiya (Be my baby)

Yeogin gong-gimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo



Be my be my Baby girl

Be my be my nollawo

My baby girl, wanna be my baby



Please more be bright

Nuga gamhi neol nonhae blah blah blah (No No)

Take it easy not busy not ppichim

Nachbich-i eoduwojim bichnadeon bich-i

Please be my lady



Neon ikkeullin mam ti naedo dwae

Neuseunhi naege gidae lay back

Jeongjeog, sigan-eun meomchugo hadeon geon jib-eo deonjyeo

Heugbaeg pilleum gat-eun ilsang-ui neolaneun link

Dulman-ui sesang sog jeonhyeo bon jeog eobs-eossdeon

Bich-i na du nun-eul ttel su eobsji

Michil deus ganglyeolhan bulkkoch-i teojin bam

Neon nunbusin unmyeong-ui seonmul

Come on come on come on

Here we go now, hey



Neoleul gajgo sip-eo Baby (yeah)

Ne tumyeonghan nunbich-eul ttala

Nae soljighan mam-eul jeonhalge neon nollaji ma

Geobu hal su eobs-eo Lady (oh)

Deo gakkawojin dul-ui geoli

Jag-eun solimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo



Yaiyaiya (yeah) yaiyaiya

(Come on come on come on)

Yaiyaiya (oh)

Girl you shine like a diamond

(Just like a diamond)

Geobu hal su eobs-eo Lady (oh)

Deo gakkawojin dul-ui geoli

Yeogin gong-gimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo



Neolo gadeug chaeun mam seonmyeonghan gamgag

Hanbeondo neukkin jeog eobsdeon



Minteu masbodado siwonhae

Jujeneun PINK jieonae



Idaelo gyeot-e iss-eojwo

If you wanna be wanna be my Baby (yeah)

Then tonight is the right time

Come on come on come on

Here we go now, hey



Neoleul gajgo sip-eo Baby (yeah)

Nae tumyeonghan ma-eum-eul bwabwa

Deo gadeughi neoleul dam-eulge neon nollaji ma

Geobuhal su eobs-eo Lady (oh)

Deo gakkawojin uli geoli

(Together yeah yeah)

Jag-eun solimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo

(To be my Baby)



Yaiyaiya (yeah) yaiyaiya

(Come on come on come on)

Yaiyaiya (oh)

Girl you shine like a diamond (Hey)



Geobuhal su eobs-eo Lady (oh)

Deo gakkawojin uli geoli

Yeogin gong-gimajeo deo teugbyeolhaejyeo
